confcost.controller.ke

Class NoKeyExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • confcost.controller.ke.KeyExchange
      • confcost.controller.ke.NoKeyExchange

  • public class NoKeyExchange
extends KeyExchange
    Implements functionality to exchange keys if no key exchange protocol was specified.

    NoKeyExchange simply sends any required keys to the communications partner unencrypted.

    Author:
    Marc Eichler
